DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read user terms of use acceptance statuses
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read terms of use acceptance statuses on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read your terms of use acceptance statuses
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read your terms of use acceptance statuses.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read terms of use acceptance statuses that user can access
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read terms of use acceptance statuses on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read all terms of use acceptance statuses
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read terms of use acceptance statuses on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all terms of use acceptance statuses
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read terms of use acceptance statuses, without a signed in user.
